actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require open campus security crime logs at institutions of higher education.
short_title: Open Campus Police Logs Act of 1996
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Open Campus Police Logs Act of 1996 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 (HEA) to require any higher education institution which participates in any student aid program under HEA title IV, and which maintains a police or security department, to keep a daily log of specified information about crimes which is open to public inspection.

titles.title: Open Campus Police Logs Act of 1996
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require open campus security crime logs at institutions of higher education.
